utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: God that is the most beautiful engagement ring ever!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah? Well, you should know. You’ve bought like a billion of ‘em.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, you didn’t get one.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, well tonight’s the big night.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay listen, how are you gonna ask her?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It is going to be perfect. I am taking her to her favorite restaurant. I’m going to get her a bottle of the champagne that she really loves; therefore knows how expensive it is. Then when the glasses are full, instead of proposing a toast I’m just gonna propose.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That sounds perfect!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You’re gonna mess it up let me do it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m not gonna mess it up.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: If she says no, can I have the ring?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She’s not gonna say no.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: If!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi Monica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Give me it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s gone.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi Monica.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We’re practically kissing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Rach!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are any of you guys free tonight? My boss is hosting this charity event for underprivileged kids and the more people I bring, the better I look. So, Monica? Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, Monica and Chandler can’t go. We’re going to dinner remember?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, I’m so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s the big deal?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I just get mad when Rachel doesn’t remember where we’re going.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How about you guys?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Open bar?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I think so.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can do that for the kids.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, y’know what? I’ll come too. I’m making money now; it’s about time I give something back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you could also give back the money you owe me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Have a benefit.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Ross, listen can you come to a charity event tonight?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no, I have plans with Elizabeth.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, so you’re already doing your part for the kids.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry, it’s just one of my last nights together before she leaves for camp—to be a counselor!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross let me ask you a question. All jokes aside, where is this relationship going?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait a minute, all jokes aside? I didn’t agree to that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you really see this as a long-term thing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know, you are 12 years older than her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute, does-does everyone feel this way?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah, sort of. I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-uh—Wow! Uh, I thought you guys were just like making jokes, I had no idea. What you know what? You guys are wrong. Uh yes, there is a chronological age difference but I never notice it. You know why? Because she is very mature. Besides, it doesn’t really matter to me what you guys think. I mean, I’m the one dating Elizabeth, not you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s not what she said last night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: See? Now, he could date her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Will you marry me? Will you marry me? Hey, you marry me! What’s going on little elves?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s the big night! We wanted to wish you good luck!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah you have the ring?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, right here in my pocket. Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Oop!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, now will you guys get out of here? I want this is to be a surprise and she’s gonna know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah you guys. Get out of here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You are beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, thank you! What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We’re just really…very excited about this charity event that we have to go to.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So now what’s going on here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh well, uh this is a silent auction. They lay out all the stuff here and then you write down your offer and then the highest bid gets it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I know what a silent is I meant, what’s going on with your hair?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, wh-why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! It’s nice!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: Nice to see you Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: So glad you brought someone.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Someone? I brought people. Mr. Thompson, this is Phoebe. Phoebe, this is Mr. Thompson. He’s the head of my department.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And I also brought my friend Joey…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh!! Shrimp toast!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y’know I-I don’t know where he is.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: Well, I hope you’re gonna bid on some things Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y’know what? Actually, I was about to bid on this lovely trip to Paris.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: Ohh, nice choice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: Good luck.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you. Okay, twenty dollars.

utterance.speaker: Zoe
utterance.content: Shut the door! Shut the door!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s-what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: The guys across the hall are throwing water balloons at us.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, you have to call the police! That’s what I did to the kids in my building!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: No, it’s a water balloon fight! We started it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! Listen umm, I, I just stopped by to see if you wanted to see this play tonight. Umm, it’s supposed to be excellent. The director is the same…

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Who drank all the Kamikazes?

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Nobody! We put them in here!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: You want some?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! Okay! Okay! Okay, look, can I, can I just-just talk to you for a second?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Yeah, sure.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, so this play umm, what do you think? It’s-it’s gotten great reviews! Y’know the uh…

utterance.speaker: First Dorm Guy
utterance.content: Attack!

utterance.speaker: Second Dorm Guy
utterance.content: Put your balloons down!

utterance.speaker: The Girls
utterance.content: You put your balloons down!!

utterance.speaker: First Dorm Guy
utterance.content: You put your balloons down!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Everybody put their balloons down!!! Now this is a nice suit!!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: Our next item is the romantic trip to Paris. It goes to Emil Alexander high a high bid of 2,300.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh! So close!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey you guys! Look!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I got me some drinks!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Open bar!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well now it’s an empty bar.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You just can’t stand anyone else enjoying themselves can’t you?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: And finally, our biggest item of the night, the 22-foot gentleman’s day sailer sailboat. The winning bid was a whooping $20,000!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I won! That was my guess!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! What?! What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I guessed 20,000!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! It is an auction! You don’t guess, you buy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! I don’t have 20,000!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: Congratulations on your new boat, Joey Tribbiani!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! Sit down!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Forget her! You enjoy this!! (Pulls him back up and starts applauding again. Joey waves and does a salute.]

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: One nation, under God. Indivisible with liberty and justice for all. I remembered it. The champagne is here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! Yes! I’m good! Are you good? Are you good? Is everything—are you—are you perrr-perfect?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. I’m okay. I’m actually—I’m a little cold, can I have your jacket?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. Uh, no you can’t have my jacket! Because then I would be cold! If you thought that you were going to be cold, you should’ve brought your own jacket. But uh, other than that, are you okay? Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you sure you’re okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! I’m fine. In fact I’ve been fine for a long time now and I think, the reason is you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh that’s sweet!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay umm, before I meant you I had really little life and I couldn’t imagine growing old with…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, but just let me say it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, Richard.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?! I’m Chandler! Oh, that’s Richard!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God, maybe he won’t see us. Richard!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Monica! Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey-hey, hey! I don’t know why I did that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, it’s good to see you!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: You too, you let uh, your hair grow long.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah—Oh that’s right. You, you always wanted me too. Hey, I see you got your mustache back.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well, my nose got lonely.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And uh, you don’t have a mustache which is good. I’m Chandler; I make jokes when I’m uncomfortable.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. Lisa, Monica, Chandler. We used to date.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Richard! No one supposed to know about us! See I, did it again.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, wh-why don’t we sit down?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I’ll sit down.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s good to see you

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh. Good to see you guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: That might be fun.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What were you thinking?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I didn’t know it was an auction!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I figured, take a guess, help a charity, free boat!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why would a charity give away a free boat?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know! Charity?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, just buy the damn boat!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, don’t you think you’ve had enough to drink?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m just helping the kids!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How is you drinking helping the kids?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because the more I drink, the less there is for the kids to drink.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: Mr. Tribbiani.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hi!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: Your generous contribution brings us a big step closer to building the youth center.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just out of curiosity, how-how much is that boat worth?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: I think it was valued at 19,000

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, I was pretty close. Uhh, so bad news. Umm, I can’t buy the boat, I don’t have any money.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! Joey, good one!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Thompson
utterance.content: That’s good. Very good!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So uh listen, I think I’m gonna take off now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! You…can’t…leave Joey! You agreed to buy that boat, all right?! That is a contract! And plus if you leave, my boss is gonna kill me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, what am I gonna do Rach?! I don’t have that kind of money!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. Okay. Okay. Okay. All right. All right, this is what we’re gonna do, we are gonna go to the next highest bidder, and we are just gonna let them buy it, and then you’re just gonna pay the difference.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I don’t know why the kids need a youth center anyway! Y’know? They should just watch TV after school like I did and I turned out fine!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Not great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And so, we’re hiding in the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: And-and then I sneak out and before Monica can her parents come in.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So I hide in the shower and the next thing you know they’re going at it right on the bathroom floor.

utterance.speaker: Lisa
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I got a good one, I got a good one! I once walked in on both my parents making love to the same guy.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: It’s so great seeing you guys again. I’d like to make a toast. Uh, as a poet once said, "In the sweetness of friendship, let there be laughter and sharing of pleasures for in the due of little things the heart finds it’s morning and is refreshed."

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God, you guys!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Before you say anything, have we got a story for you! Guess who we bumped into at dinner!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Richard!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? A-ohh! Ohh. Oh that’s right that’s right. That’s Richard’s favorite place too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh you knew that. Good!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I thought you were going out with Elizabeth.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I was but uh, she was a little busy with a water balloon fight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh Ross, sometimes grown-ups have commitments they just can’t get out of!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know, maybe she is too young for me. Y’know, when I was over there and she was running around with her friends, I felt like I was a baby-sitter. I finally started to see what you guys were talking about. I don’t know what to do.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don’t you just weigh out the good stuff about the relationship against the bad stuff. I mean that’s what I did when I first weighing stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay umm, bad stuff. Well, I’m-I’m 12 years older than she is.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: If the school finds out you’re fired.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She’s leaving for three months.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: For camp!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, good stuff. Umm, well she’s-she’s sweet and pretty and…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look Ross, the only question you need to ask is, "Do you see a future?" I mean like do you see yourself marrying her? Oh my God! You did it already! You married her, didn’t you?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No! I…didn’t do that. It’s just… Okay, honestly no. I don’t, I don’t see a big future with her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay well I think…that’s your answer.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’ve got to talk to her. Ugh, I hate this part.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, you have to forget about Elizabeth. I mean if you’re not careful you may not get married at all this year!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach! Rachel! Okay, the next highest bidder is at table one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh and uh the guy who got the Paris trip is at table four.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why do you care about the guy who won the Paris trip?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s a trip for two! Excuse me. Excuse me, is the person who won the Paris trip at this table?

utterance.speaker: Emil Alexander
utterance.content: That was me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, en chante.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, excuse me is there a Mr. Bowmont at this table?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bowmont
utterance.content: That’s me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ahh, yes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh well, hello. This is your lucky day Mr. Bowmont, the uh gentleman day sailer as just become available again and I believe that you made a bid of $18,000.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You-you have to pay that! It’s not just a guess.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bowmont
utterance.content: I was actually relieved uh I didn’t win the boat. My wife would’ve killed me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kidding me?! She’s gonna this boat!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y-Yeah! What-what is your wife’s name?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bowmont
utterance.content: It’s Pam.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pam! Oh God okay, just imagine this, "The Pam."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aw-awww!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bowmont
utterance.content: I don’t think she’d like that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, uh-uh imagine this, "The Mr. Bowmont."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oooooh…

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bowmont
utterance.content: I don’t think so dear.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay look, let me paint you a little picture. All right, you are settin’ sail up the Hudson! You’ve got the wind in your h——arms! You-you get all that peace and quiet that you’ve always wanted! You get back to nature! You can go fishin’! You can—ooh, you can get one of those little hats and have people call you captain, and then when you’re old, Cappy.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Bowmont
utterance.content: What the hell, it’s for a good cause! All right!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No way! It’s mine!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All that stuff you just said? I want that!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But Joey you don’t have $20,000!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who cares?! I-I’ll make payments, whatever it takes, I want the Mr. Bowmont!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God, you’re back!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, let me see it! Let me see your hand!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why do you want to see my hand?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I wanna see what’s in your hand. I wanna see the trash.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Eww! Oh, it’s all dirty. You should throw this out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What did you guys just do?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Richard was there so I couldn’t do it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! Noooo…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m gonna do it tomorrow y’know, and-and surprise her, but now you’ve ruined it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We didn’t ruin it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who walks into a room and asks to see a person’s hands?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, a palm reader, a manicurist, a hand doctor…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Glove salesman!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good one! Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is terrible. What am I going to do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look, she only suspects something okay? She doesn’t know for sure, so just throw her off the track.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s right, I can throw her off. I can make her think marriage is the last thing on my mind.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah! Convince her that-that you’re scared of commitment! Convince her that you’re a little coward!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can do that, I’ve had 30 years of practice.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, being you is finally gonna pay off!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I had to go all the way to the basement because some idiot keeps stuffing the trash chute with pizza boxes!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That guy’s still doing that?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Oh my God you’re here, let me see your hand!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, you’re too late!!! She already took out the trash!!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! I have never had such a healthy break-up! She was such a grown-up about it! She didn’t seem too immature for me! Did I just make a huge mistake?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Ross! Wait!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Elizabeth, thank God! I was just thinking about…

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: You suck!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, break-up’s still on!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, okay, here she comes! How do I look? Do I look like a guy who doesn’t want to get married?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! And also, a little like a French guy. I never noticed that before.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you up too?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, just hanging out, talkin’ about uh, websites. Yeah, we saw this really interesting website about marriage and how totally unnecessary it is and how its just a way for the government to keep tabs on you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, Big Brother.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well that’s a little crazy. Although I am y’know glad to hear that you’re branching out on what you look at on the Internet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well… Y’know, it just got me thinking though, why would anybody ever want to get married huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why?! To celebrate your relationship! To solidify your commitment! To declare your love for one another to the world!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Eh…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay well that’s good to know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The Mr. Bowmont’s here!!!

utterance.speaker: Waitress
utterance.content: Hey Monica, there’s a customer who wants to complement the chef, should I let him in?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure, I love this part!

utterance.speaker: Waitress
utterance.content: Come on in.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Richard!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Actually, I’m not here to complement the chef.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh… Oh, that’s okay I hate when people come back to complement the chef. Like I have nothing better to do! So what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well, it was great seeing you the other night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, good to see you too. Did you come down here to tell me that?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: No! I came here to tell you something else. I came here to tell you I still love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What uh—What did you—What?!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I still love you. And I know I probably shouldn’t even be here telling you this, I mean you’re with Chandler a guy I really like, and if you say he’s straight I’ll believe you! After seeing ya the other night I knew if I didn’t tell ya I’d regret it for the rest of my life. Letting you go was the stupidest thing I ever did.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know you’re really not supposed to be back here!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well yeah, I’m sorry. I know this is the wrong time and the wrong place but I had to tell ya! I wanna spend my life with you. I wanna marry you. I wanna have kids with you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God… Why don’t they put chairs back here?!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I know this is crazy but am I too late?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What the… Yes you’re too late! Where was all this three years ago?!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well I know I was an idiot! And I tried to forget you, I really did! Y’know after we had lunch last year I spent six months in Africa trying to get you out of my head!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What were you doing in Africa?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Working with blind kids.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohhh! What are you doing to me?! Oh look, I-I… I’m sorry but umm, this-this-this-this is not going to happen.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Okay that’s fine, I’ll walk away. And I’ll never bother you again, but only if you tell me Chandler’s willing to give you everything I am.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well he is! Yeah, I mean marriage is all he talks about! My goodness, in fact, I’m the one that’s making him wait!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: You are?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why? Because of the government.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Isn’t it incredible?! Monica and Chandler, gettin’ married.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know, they’re gonna be so happy together.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh… I mean two best friends falling in love, how often does that happen?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Not that often!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! I’m so happy for them!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Me too! So happy for them!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m so happy and not at all jealous.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no! No God, definitely not jealous!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean I’m probably 98% happy, maybe 2% jealous. And I mean what’s 2%? That’s nothing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Totally. I’m like 90/10.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah me too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey uh, have you guys scene Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh—no, but y’know who did stop in here looking for ya, Tennille.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So that marriage stuff that you were saying yesterday, you don’t really believe that do you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure I do. In fact, I think the whole concept of marriage is unnatural. I mean look at pigs. Let’s take a second here and look at pigs. Okay pigs don’t mate for life. I mean a pig can have like a hundred sexual partners in a lifetime, and that’s just an ordinary pig not even a pig that’s good at sports!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but that’s pigs not people!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If marriage worked, I’d be all for it. But do you know what the divorce rate in this country is? 97%.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute. Are you honestly telling me that-that you may never want to get married?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, never say never but y’know probably uh yeah, never.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Then-then-then what are we even doing?! What is this?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What is all this pressure?! Is this some new kind of strategy? Why don’t you put down your copy of ‘The Rules’ huh mantrap?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what?! I gotta go! Ugh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s okay, I got a plan.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We’re gonna find love!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Definitely!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m pretty confident about that. That’s what makes it so easy for me to be 80% happy for Monica and Chandler! It would be nice to have a little guarantee though.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well y’know, some people make deals with a friend, like if neither of them are married by the time they’re 40, they marry each other.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You mean a backup?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Exactly!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah I got that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hm-mmm.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you serious?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I locked him years ago!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh… So… If neither of you are married by the time you’re 40, you’re gonna marry Joey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yep, we shook on it. Yeah but believe me that is not how he wanted to seal the deal.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, seriously?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, yeah. I think his exact words were…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Charming.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well hey, it’s just a backup.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Have you seen Rachel? Or a mirror?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is for my boat, pretty cool huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, it’s great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa, what’s the matter?! Talk to the captain!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m just having one of those days where you realize you’re in a dead-end relationship!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler giving you a hard time huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s not like I want to get married tomorrow! It’s just that I-I’d like to believe that I’m in a relationship that’s actually going somewhere, that I’m not just wasting my time!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, you know Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No I don’t know Chandler! Not anymore! It’s like it’s like something’s changed.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe you changed?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I didn’t change!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe that’s the problem.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler is a complex fellow, one who is unlikely to take a wife.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is that some kind of boat talk?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know! I haven’t totally decided how to talk on my boat yet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What does he think? Does he think I’m just gonna wait around for nothing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica face it, Chandler is against marriage. And-and always will be!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well there’s some people who do want to marry me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There are?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! Richard!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: R-R-Richard said he wants to marry you?! And-and Chandler’s tellin’ ya how much he hates marriage?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler loves marriage!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You just told me that he hates marriage! That-that he’s a-a complex fellow who’s unlikely to take a wife! That-that he’s against marriage and always will be!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You got that from what I said?!

utterance.speaker: Narrator
utterance.content: When the Cretaceous period ended, the dinosaurs were gone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What happened you guys?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, come on in.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh thank you. Hey y’know, I’m so sorry to hear about you and Elizabeth.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, thanks. Yeah, I really thought we’d be able to make it work, but uh, I guess it just wasn’t meant to be.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, love. It’s a tricky business isn’t it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I guess so.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So what do you say we make a pact? If you and I are both single by the time we’re 40, we get married. I mean, we know each other, we like each other, and we’ve-we’ve already slept together so y’know there’ll be no surprises there! You know what I mean? No like, "What’s that?!"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right. Ohh! You-you want me to be your backup.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Exactly.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, yeah I already have one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Who?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe?! Wait a—but-but she just, she said that Joey was her backup.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross! I just had a conversation with her, and she said that she and Joey made a deal!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s impossible! I mean we have had a deal for years! We-we-we shook on it, although believe me she wanted to do a lot more than that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where the hell have you been?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was making a coconut phone with the professor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Richard told Monica he wants to marry her!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah, I’ve been trying to find ya to tell to stop messing with her and maybe I would have if these damn boat shoes wouldn’t keep flying off!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: My—Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! They suck!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He’s not supposed to ask my girlfriend to marry him! I’m supposed to do that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well what… Y’know what I’m gonna do? I’m gonna go over there; I’m gonna kick his ass! Will you help me?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, Chandler I don’t think us getting our asses kicked is a solution. Okay? Just go and find Monica!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. I’m gonna get the ring! I’m gonna get the ring! I’m gonna go find her and I’m just going to propose!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude-dude-dude!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Let me know about that coconut phone, it might great for the boat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t know why I’m here.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I didn’t ask. You wanna come in?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Well, I’ll just leave the door open and go sit on the couch.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler is such an idiot!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Drink?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I’ll have a scotch…

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: …on the rocks with a twist? I remember.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Still smoking cigars?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Uh, no! No! That’s…art! If it bothers you I can put my art out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No that’s, that’s okay.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: So Monica let me ask you a question. Y’know, since we broke up do you ever, think about me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh yeah, I-I actually I thought about you a couple months ago.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh really?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah but it was because I-I had an eye exam and I don’t like my new eye doctor.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Edward Nevski?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Yeah he’s no good. Do you ever think about me in a non-eye doctor way?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Ahh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But getting over was the hardest thing that I’ve ever had to do. And I never let myself think about you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe! You picked Joey and Ross?! You can not have two backups!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Of course I can! It’s just good sense to backup your backup! Look, I’ve already lost Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Phoebe! We’re both your backup?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, how could you do this to me?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t—Look I don’t know what you’re complaining about now? You were both aware of the situation!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No we weren’t!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was not!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, this kind of back talk is not gonna fly when we’re married!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe you can’t have both of them! You have to pick one!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pick me!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! Pick me! I don’t want to end up an old maid!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right well let’s see, Ross is a good father, but Joey has a boat—This is hard!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is crazy! Hey look, I wanna switch to Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ooh, I wanna switch to Rachel too!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No wait! Just—Okay—Just wait! You guys! Wait you guys! Don’t make any rash decisions, okay? Just remember my promise, when we get married, three times a week.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God, Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m talking about massages.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y’know what?! I know-I know how to settle this! All right here, this is what we’re gonna do! I’m gonna write Joey on one napkin and I’m gonna right Ross on the other napkin and we are going to pick one! And that person is going to be our backup! Okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay that’s fair.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pick one.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Left! Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You’re welcome.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! We should just switch.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah absolutely!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I missed you-you ugly, flat faced old freak!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! Him.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh. Whew!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I missed this apartment! Now, this is a grown-up’s apartment! Y’know, I-I should be with a grown-up, do you know what I mean?!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Yeah! You’re saying, you need to be with someone more mature. Maybe someone with, a license to practice medicine. Or a mustache.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know, let’s face it, I’m not a kid anymore! I-I need to be with someone who-who wants the same things that I do! I mean coming to my place of work and telling me that you love me, I want that! Talking about pig sex over lunch, I don’t want that!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I think that’s fair.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fair? Please don’t even talk to me about fair! Fair would’ve been you wanting to marry me back then! Or fair would’ve been Chandler wanting to marry me now! Believe me, nothing about this is fair! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: It’s okay! Shh! Hey. Hey. Shhhh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nothing. I don’t kn—Umm. I don’t know. Umm…

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know, I-I… I have to figure…some st—Y’know, some stuff before I can…

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Yeah, I understand. Take as much time as you want. Ten, even twenty minutes if you need it. I’ll be here. Not smoking.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where is she? I’m not scared of you!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: She’s not here and please come in.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Scotch on the rocks, with a twist, on a coaster? Ha-ha, Monica! Monica!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Okay, she was here, but she left.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well where did she go?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well she said she had to think things over.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God, I can’t believe this! Y’know, I thought…I thought you were a good guy.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Oh, hey look nothing happened.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nothing happened? Nothing? So you didn’t tell my girlfriend that you love her?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well all right, one thing happened?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know what? I can’t believe this! Do you know what you did? My girlfriend is out there thinking things over! You made my girlfriend think!!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And what does she have to think about? I love her!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well, apparently I’m willing to offer her things that you are not.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But I am willing to offer her all those things. This was just a plan, y’know? A way to throw her off course so that when I offered her all these things, she’d be surprised!

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: Well if it helps, it worked very well.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It was working until you showed up, you big tree! I mean, this isn’t fair. You had your chance with her! You had your chance and you blew it! And this is my chance and I am not going to blow it because we are meant for each other! And this is all just been one stupid mistake! I was gonna propose tonight.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: You were gonna propose?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah I even got a ring. Did you get a ring?

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: No I don’t have a ring! You go get her Chandler. And can I give you a piece of advice? If you do get her, don’t let her go. Trust me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know Richard…you are a good guy.

utterance.speaker: Richard
utterance.content: I know. I hate that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can’t talk to you now, I gotta find Monica!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She’s gone.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She’s gone. She had a bag and she left.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She was all crying. She-she said you guys want different things, and that and that she needed time to think.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well why didn’t you stop her?! Why didn’t you just tell her it was a plan?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I-I did! I told her everything, Chandler! But she wouldn’t believe me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well where… Where did she go?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: To her parent’s I think and she said you shouldn’t call her. But if I were you I would.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can’t believe I ruined this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I am so sorry man.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You wanted it to be a surprise.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler… In all my life… I never thought I would be so lucky. As to…fall in love with my best…my best… There’s a reason why girls don’t do this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Okay! Oh God, I thought… Wait a minute, I-I can do this. I thought that it mattered what I said or where I said it. Then I realized the only thing that matters is that you, you make me happier than I ever thought I could be. And if you’ll let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way. Monica, will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I knew you were likely to take a wife!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Can we come it yet?! We’re dying out here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come in! Come in! We’re engaged!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh, this is the least jealous I’ve ever been!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no wait no, this is wrong! Ross isn’t here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh hell, he’s done this three times! He knows what its about!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!
